Bridging the digital divide

A community interested in technology, mentorship and service projects to promote digital literacy across Hawaii.

UPDATES


  • Recruiting motivated high school students!, Jan 22, 2021

    Are you a high school student interested in learning more about technology, networking with peers, and making a positive community difference during the pandemic?

  • New site under construction, Jan 21, 2021

    We are in the process of building our website and adding content. In the meantime, subscribe to get email updates!

Our goal

Technology Outreach Hawaii aims to guide Hawaii towards confidence in being users and/or creators of technology while empowering youth. We are working to partner with libraries and community organizations across the state to offer student-driven digital literacy initiatives.

OUR TEAM

Meet our mix of undergraduate and graduate students with interests in computer science, physics, math, and medicine.



What we do

Promote technology education

We start and support projects related to technology education.

Explore our current projects

Make resources accessible

We aim to be the hub for all free community technology resources across the state.

View the list of community resources

Empower youth

We encourage mentorship, service, and character building activities for youth.

Join our volunteer network
